FRIDAY Sept PERIOD   HealthDay News  While the start of the school year can give kids and teens the chance to reconnect with friends and enjoy school sports and activities it can also trigger stressors that send many to the emergency room for mental health woes a new report shows PERIOD

Among children aged  to  emergency department visits for depression suicidal thoughts stress and substance abuse increased significantly in the fall and remained high through the spring the report from the U.S PERIOD Centers for Disease Control and Prevention found PERIOD

 a CDC spokesperson said PERIOD

 the spokesperson added PERIOD

The factors that contribute to the increase in mental issues  like social media peer pressure or home life  werent addressed in the research the spokesperson noted PERIOD

For the study published Sept PERIOD  in the CDCs Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report researchers used data from the National Syndromic Surveillance Program for  distinct conditions from January  to June  PERIOD

 the spokesperson noted PERIOD

For children aged  to  the number and proportion of emergency department visits increased for depressive disorders suicidal ideation or selfharm trauma and stressorrelated disorders mood disorders and symptoms of mental and substance use conditions the researchers found PERIOD

 the CDC spokesperson said PERIOD

Increases in emergency department visits among children and teens have been on the rise for a number of years said Dr PERIOD Victor Fornari vice chair of child and adolescent psychiatry at Zucker Hillside Hospital  Cohens Childrens Medical Center in Glen Oaks N.Y PERIOD

 Fornari said PERIOD Seasonal variations in these psychiatric emergencies reflect the various activities related to school peers and family life he added PERIOD

As these problems have increased schools have been forced to play an everexpanding role in their students mental wellbeing Fornari noted PERIOD

 he explained PERIOD

Its not surprising that the school year sees an uptick in these problems as stresses mount and kids have to deal with school and social pressures PERIOD

 Fornari said PERIOD
